welcome_message_body: Welcome to Denver, the Mile High City! Get ready to explore the stunning Rocky Mountains, enjoy our vibrant arts scene, and experience the charm of our beautiful city. We hope you have a wonderful stay!

restaurants.name: Denver Biscuit Company
restaurants.description: Denver Biscuit Company is a comfort food restaurant located in Aurora.

restaurants.name: Annette
restaurants.description: Annette is a new american restaurant located in Aurora.

restaurants.name: Four Friends Kitchen
restaurants.description: Four Friends Kitchen is a breakfast spot located in Denver.

restaurants.name: Chick-fil-A
restaurants.description: Chick-fil-A is a fast food restaurant located in Denver.

restaurants.name: Wahoo's Fish Taco
restaurants.description: Wahoo's Fish Taco is a taco restaurant located in Denver.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Denver International Airport, housing ticketing, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: A Gates
terminals.description: One of three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: B Gates
terminals.description: One of three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: C Gates
terminals.description: One of three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Jeffco Airport is dedicated to serving private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
